simplestorage.crate.info:
Upgradable storage.
Randomly selects a variant upon placement (can be changed).
Configurable to keep inventory on disassembly
simplestorage.crate.chest_swap: Use on a chest to swap in place
simplestorage.crate.wrench:
Left-click with a wrench to disassemble.
Sneak-Right-click with a wrench with an upgrade in your off-hand.
Sneak-Right-click with wrench to cycle variants.
simplestorage.warding_charm.info: Crate Upgrade for keeping inventory when disassembled
